column4: hi guys i got a question about 12.04 LTS 32bit and pae from what i read it automatic when it detects the architecture is this correct?
the kernel has PAE compiled into it so it is ued regardless
could get an i7 with intel and no nvidia, it'll run fine
yeah its the extra chip causing the issue, there is a hybrid guide for ubuntu but I've not used it first hand
your 32bit PAE kernel can access up to 64Gb RAM, but each process will see 3.2Gb RAM max
depends on the app you are using in Wine really
how do you mean 'media'? It's so ambiguous it's nearly meaningless
they are equal in that way
just relaxing and slowly moving back into ubuntu 12.04
you just beat me to that
ask here, the channel will reply
